I asked network team for the available ip address and he shared this is available ip address 172.27.0.0
I need 2^14 = 16384 IP which will start from 172.27.0.0
So we configured our VPC: "172.27.0.0/18"
hence 16384/256 = 64 (next available ip address in the world will start from 172.27.64.0 because we allocated 172.27.0.0 to 172.27.63.255)
Details as bellows:

Subnet1
172.27.0.0 - 172.27.0.255
172.27.1.0 - 172.27.1.255
172.27.2.0 - 172.27.2.255
172.27.3.0 - 172.27.3.255
172.27.4.0 - 172.27.4.255
172.27.5.0 - 172.27.5.255
172.27.6.0 - 172.27.6.255
172.27.7.0 - 172.27.7.255

Subnet2
172.27.8.0 - 172.27.8.255
172.27.9.0 - 172.27.9.255
172.27.10.0 - 172.27.10.255
172.27.11.0 - 172.27.11.255
172.27.12.0 - 172.27.12.255
172.27.13.0 - 172.27.13.255
172.27.14.0 - 172.27.14.255
172.27.15.0 - 172.27.15.255

Subnet3
172.27.16.0 - 172.27.16.255

Subnet4
172.27.24.0 - 172.27.24.255

Subnet5
172.27.32.0 - 172.27.32.255

Subnet6
172.27.40.0 - 172.27.40.255

Subnet7
172.27.48.0 - 172.27.48.255
172.27.49.0 - 172.27.49.255
172.27.50.0 - 172.27.50.255
172.27.51.0 - 172.27.51.255
172.27.52.0 - 172.27.52.255
172.27.53.0 - 172.27.53.255
172.27.54.0 - 172.27.54.255
172.27.55.0 - 172.27.55.255


Subnet8
172.27.56.0 - 172.27.56.255
172.27.57.0 - 172.27.57.255
172.27.58.0 - 172.27.58.255
172.27.59.0 - 172.27.59.255

Subnet9
172.27.60.0 - 172.27.60.255
172.27.61.0 - 172.27.61.255
172.27.62.0 - 172.27.62.255
172.27.63.0 - 172.27.63.255


172.27.64.0
